header.name: My name Is Simon Melichar
header.description: I'm a passionate web developer with experience in building dynamic websites and applications. My goal is to create high-quality, scalable solutions. Let's work together and build something amazing!

about.title: About Me
about.content: Hi! I'm Simon, a passionate web developer based in Prague. I specialize in building fast and responsive websites with modern JavaScript frameworks like React, and backend technologies such as Node.js and Laravel. I love solving complex problems and creating user-friendly interfaces.
about.skillsList: React, Node.js, Laravel, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, MySQL, Git, Agile methodology.

omne.title: About Me
omne.description: Hi, I'm Simon Melichar, a web developer with over 10 years of experience. I specialize in creating high-quality, scalable, and user-friendly applications. My passion lies in problem-solving and building innovative solutions to help businesses thrive.
omne.additionalInfo: When I'm not coding, I enjoy learning new technologies, exploring the latest trends in web development, and collaborating with like-minded professionals.

pricing.title: Web Development Pricing
pricing.basicDescription: A simple static website with a few pages.
pricing.ecommerceDescription: A fully functional e-commerce platform with payment integration.
pricing.customDescription: A dynamic, interactive web application with complex functionality.
pricing.description1: With over 10 years of experience in web development, I am committed to delivering solutions that meet your unique needs. I prioritize high-quality code, user-friendly design, and seamless functionality to create web applications that stand out.
pricing.description2: I take a personalized approach to every project, ensuring that your goals are at the forefront of my work. From initial consultation to final delivery, I provide a collaborative experience to bring your vision to life.
pricing.description3: With a focus on long-term partnerships, I offer continuous support and improvements to ensure your website or application grows with your business. Let's work together to turn your ideas into a successful digital product!

projects.title: My Projects
projects.reactDescription: This React project focuses on building a fast, interactive, and responsive single-page application (SPA) for a dynamic content management system. The goal was to create a seamless user experience with minimal loading times and smooth transitions between pages, leveraging React's component-based architecture and state management with hooks and Context API.
projects.laravelDescription: Built using the Laravel framework, this project involved developing a custom backend API for a business management platform. I integrated secure user authentication, roles and permissions, as well as advanced data validation. Laravel's Eloquent ORM made database management straightforward, while Blade templates allowed for the creation of a clean, dynamic frontend.
projects.cSharpDescription: In this C# project, I developed a desktop application that handles inventory management for small businesses. The application is built with a focus on ease of use, data integrity, and speed. I used Windows Forms for the UI and integrated it with SQL Server for database management, enabling users to add, update, and track inventory levels in real-time.
projects.toolsTitle: The Importance of Using the Right Tools
projects.toolsDescription: Choosing the right technologies for a project is critical to its success. Whether it's React for building fast and interactive user interfaces, Laravel for robust backend systems, or C# for creating reliable desktop applications, each tool has its strengths that can make a project more efficient and scalable. I make it a point to stay up to date with the latest advancements in each technology to ensure that my projects deliver the best results for my clients.
projects.processDescription: The journey of a project starts with understanding the client's needs, brainstorming the features, and designing the architecture. Once development begins, I focus on writing clean, maintainable code, testing thoroughly, and ensuring the user interface is intuitive and responsive. After deployment, I offer ongoing support to ensure the application continues to perform optimally as user needs evolve.
